page.title: 10HOLME FESTIVAL
page.content: ONCE A YEAR WE HAVE A FESTIVAL FOR WHICH EVERY ROAD MAKES A FLOAT AND ENTERS IT IN THE COMPETITION.THE FESTIVAL STARTS IN THE MORNING AT ABOUT 10 AM WITH A GYMKHANA. AT TWELVE O' CLOCK THE FLOATS START TO PROCESS FROM HOLME FARM RIGHT AROUND THE VILLAGE UNTIL THEY END UP AT THE FESTIVAL FIELD DOWN ON MILNTHORPE ROAD. IT USED TO BE ON MAYFIELD . AFTER THE FLOATS HAVE BEEN JUDGED THE SPORTS START. THERE IS A FLAT RACE AND THEN OTHER RACES SUCH AS THE EGG AND SPOON,SACK & OBSTACLE.THE WINNERS ARE GIVEN THEIR PRIZES BY THE FESTIVAL QUEEN. SHE IS PICKED A FEW DAYS BEFORE THE FESTIVAL.
